Package com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.util.general

Class Utilities

java.lang.Object
com.phasmidsoftware.dsaipg.util.general.Utilities
public class Utilities extends Object
A utility class providing several static methods for various common operations.

  • Method Details

    • asArray

      public static <T> T[] asArray(Collection<T> ts)
      There is really no better way that I could find to do this with library/language methods. Don't try to inline this if the generic type extends something like Comparable, or you will get a ClassCastException.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the underlying type of ts.
      Parameters:
      ts - a collection of Ts.
      Returns:
      an array T[].

    • formatDecimal3Places

      public static String formatDecimal3Places(double x)
      Create a string representing a double, with three decimal places.
      Parameters:
      x - the number to show.
      Returns:
      a String representing the number rounded to three decimal places.

      Returns:

    • asInt

      public static String asInt(double x)
      Converts a double value to its integer representation as a string without commas.
      Parameters:
      x - the double value to be converted.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the rounded integer value of the input.

    • round

      public static long round(double x)
      Rounds the given double value to the nearest long value using Math.round.
      Parameters:
      x - the double value to be rounded.
      Returns:
      the closest long to the argument, with ties rounding up.

    • fillRandomArray

      public static <T> T[] fillRandomArray(Class<T> clazz, Random random, int n, Function<Random,T> f)
      Fills an array with random values generated using the supplied function and random object.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the elements in the array.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the class of the type of elements in the array.
      random - the Random object used to generate random values.
      n - the number of elements in the array.
      f - a function that takes a Random object and generates a value of type T.
      Returns:
      an array of type T filled with random values generated by the function.

    • lg

      public static double lg(double n)
      Method to calculate log to tbe base 2 of n.
      Parameters:
      n - the number whose log we need.
      Returns:
      lg n.
